meanings.meaning_en_US: The first number, representing a single unit.

examples.sentence: She has [one] apple.
He is [one] of a kind.
Only [one] person attended the meeting.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 只有一個人參加了會議。

meanings.meaning_en_US: Used to introduce a conditional clause.

examples.sentence: [If] it rains, we will stay inside.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 如果下雨，我們會待在裡面。

examples.sentence: You can come [if] you want.
I will help you [if] you ask.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 如果你請求，我會幫助你。

meanings.meaning_en_US: To be able to do something.

examples.sentence: I [can] swim very well.
Can you help me with this?
They [can] finish the project on time.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他們能按時完成這個項目。

meanings.meaning_en_US: Exactly or only.

examples.sentence: I [just] finished my homework.
He is [just] a friend.
We arrived [just] in time.

meanings.meaning_en_US: To find something pleasant or enjoyable.

examples.sentence: I [like] chocolate.
Do you [like] this song?
They [like] to go hiking.

meanings.meaning_en_US: On the subject of or concerning.

examples.sentence: We talked [about] our plans.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我們討論了我們的計畫。

examples.sentence: This book is [about] history.
I have a question [about] the assignment.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我對這個作業有一個問題。

meanings.meaning_en_US: To a higher place or position.

examples.sentence: She looked [up] at the stars.
The balloon floated [up] into the sky.
Please hold your hand [up].

meanings.meaning_en_US: To perform an action or activity.

examples.sentence: I need to [do] my homework.
What should I [do] next?
They will [do] their best.

meanings.meaning_en_US: Used to indicate negation or refusal.

examples.sentence: There is [no] reason to worry.
He said [no] to the offer.
[No] one was at home.

meanings.meaning_en_US: Away from the inside or center.

examples.sentence: She walked [out] of the room.
The lights are [out] tonight.
He is [out] of town.

meanings.meaning_en_US: A greater or additional amount.

examples.sentence: I need [more] time to finish.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我需要更多的時間來完成。

examples.sentence: She has [more] than enough.
Can you give me [more] information?
examples.translation_zh_TW: 你能給我更多的信息嗎？

meanings.meaning_en_US: In or at that place.

examples.sentence: Look over [there]!
He lives [there].
We will meet [there] at noon.

meanings.meaning_en_US: A measured or measurable period during which an action, process, or condition exists or continues.

examples.sentence: What time do we need to leave?
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我們什麼時候需要離開？

examples.sentence: Time flies when you are having fun.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 當你在享受時候，時間飛逝。

examples.sentence: The time is now to make a change.

meanings.meaning_en_US: To receive or come to have something.

examples.sentence: Can you get me a drink?
examples.translation_zh_TW: 你可以幫我拿一杯飲料嗎？

examples.sentence: I need to get more information.
They will get their results tomorrow.

meanings.meaning_en_US: Recently created or discovered; not existing before.

examples.sentence: I bought a new car.
She has a new job.
We need new ideas for the project.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我們需要為這個項目找到新點子。

meanings.meaning_en_US: Used to refer to a woman, girl, or female animal previously mentioned or easily identified.

examples.sentence: She is my best friend.
Did she arrive yet?
She loves to read books.

meanings.meaning_en_US: Human beings in general or considered collectively.

examples.sentence: Many people attended the concert.
People like to travel.
The people voted for change.

meanings.meaning_en_US: In addition; too.

examples.sentence: She likes coffee, and I also enjoy it.
He's also coming to the party.
I also finished my homework.

meanings.meaning_en_US: In what way or manner.

examples.sentence: Do you know [how] to solve this problem?
examples.translation_zh_TW: 你知道怎麼解決這個問題嗎？

examples.sentence: [How] did you learn to play the piano?
examples.translation_zh_TW: 你是怎麼學會彈鋼琴的？

examples.sentence: Can you explain [how] this works?
examples.translation_zh_TW: 你能解釋這是怎麼運作的嗎？

meanings.meaning_en_US: An unspecified amount or number of something.

examples.sentence: I would like [some] water, please.
[Some] people prefer tea over coffee.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 一些人更喜歡茶而不是咖啡。

examples.sentence: We have [some] cake left over from the party.

meanings.meaning_en_US: At the present time or moment.

examples.sentence: I am busy [now], can I call you later?
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我現在很忙，可以晚點打給你嗎？

examples.sentence: [Now] is the time to act.
He is working from home [now].

meanings.meaning_en_US: Used to refer to a different person or thing.

examples.sentence: I have two [other] options.
The [other] side of the story is important.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 那個故事的另一面也很重要。

examples.sentence: Can we consider [other] alternatives?
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我們可以考慮其他的選擇嗎？

meanings.meaning_en_US: And no one or nothing more; just.

examples.sentence: I [only] want a single piece of cake.
She [only] speaks English.
We [only] have a few minutes left.

meanings.meaning_en_US: Used to introduce a second element in a comparison.

examples.sentence: She is taller [than] her brother.
I would rather read [than] watch TV.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我寧願讀書而不是看電視。

examples.sentence: He's more experienced [than] I am.

meanings.meaning_en_US: Coming before all others in time or order.

examples.sentence: She finished the race in [first] place.
This is my [first] time in this city.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 這是我第一次來這個城市。

examples.sentence: He was the [first] to volunteer.

meanings.meaning_en_US: To be desired or approved of.

examples.sentence: She did a [good] job on the project.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她在這個專案中做得很好。

examples.sentence: It's always [good] to help others.
This is a [good] restaurant.

meanings.meaning_en_US: Expressing movement or action with the result that someone or something becomes enclosed or surrounded by something else.

examples.sentence: She walked [into] the room.
Put the toys [into] the box.
He jumped [into] the pool.

meanings.meaning_en_US: Be aware of through observation, inquiry, or information.

examples.sentence: I [know] the answer to your question.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我知道你的問題的答案。

examples.sentence: Do you [know] where she is?
He claims to [know] many languages.

meanings.meaning_en_US: Perceive with the eyes; discern visually.

examples.sentence: I can [see] the mountains from here.
Did you [see] that movie last night?
examples.translation_zh_TW: 你昨晚看到那部電影了嗎？

examples.sentence: She turned to [see] who was calling.

meanings.meaning_en_US: The number equivalent to the sum of one and one.

examples.sentence: I have [two] apples.
There are [two] sides to every story.
She is [two] years older than me.

meanings.meaning_en_US: At a later time; subsequently.

examples.sentence: We will meet [after] lunch.
He arrived [after] I left.
Let's discuss this [after] the meeting.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我們在會議結束後再討論這個。

meanings.meaning_en_US: At that time; at the time in question.

examples.sentence: I was living in Paris [then].
We finished our work and [then] went home.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我們完成工作後再回家。

examples.sentence: He will be here at 3 PM, and [then] we can leave.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他會在下午三點到，那時我們就可以離開。

meanings.meaning_en_US: Above; higher than.

examples.sentence: The plane flew [over] the mountains.
There is a blanket [over] the table.
She held the umbrella [over] us.

meanings.meaning_en_US: Used to identify a specific set of items.

examples.sentence: [These] are my favorite books.
I want to buy [these] shoes.
Have you seen [these] pictures?

meanings.meaning_en_US: To have a particular belief or idea.

examples.sentence: I [think] it's going to rain today.
Can you [think] of a solution?
examples.translation_zh_TW: 你可以想到一個解決方案嗎？

examples.sentence: I [think] he is telling the truth.

meanings.meaning_en_US: To move from one place to another.

examples.sentence: Please [go] to the store.
We should [go] now if we want to arrive on time.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 如果我們想準時到達，現在應該出發。

examples.sentence: They decided to [go] for a walk.

meanings.meaning_en_US: To create or produce something.

examples.sentence: I want to [make] a cake for her birthday.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我想為她的生日做一個蛋糕

examples.sentence: They [make] a lot of noise during the party.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他們在聚會中製造了很多噪音

examples.sentence: Can you [make] this decision by tomorrow?
examples.translation_zh_TW: 你能在明天之前做出這個決定嗎？

meanings.meaning_en_US: Used to refer to one or more unspecified things or people.

examples.sentence: Do you have [any] questions?
I don't have [any] money left.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我身上沒有任何可用的錢了

examples.sentence: You can choose [any] book from the shelf.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 你可以從架子上選擇任何一本書

meanings.meaning_en_US: The rear surface of the human body.

examples.sentence: He hurt his [back] while lifting weights.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他在舉重時弄傷了背部

examples.sentence: She has a tattoo on her [back].
The chair provides good support for the [back].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 這把椅子對背部提供很好的支撐

meanings.meaning_en_US: For the reason that; due to.

examples.sentence: He left early [because] he was tired.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他早早離開，因為他感到疲憊

examples.sentence: I didn't go out [because] it was raining.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我沒有出去，因為下雨了

examples.sentence: She studies hard [because] she wants to pass the exam.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她努力學習，因為她想通過考試

meanings.meaning_en_US: Used to express possibility or permission.

examples.sentence: You [may] leave early today.
It [may] rain later, so take your umbrella.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 等一下可能會下雨，所以帶上你的雨傘

examples.sentence: We [may] go to the movies this weekend.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我們這個周末可能會去看電影

meanings.meaning_en_US: The fifth month of the year.

examples.sentence: May is known for its flowers.
The holiday falls in [May].
We celebrate Labor Day in [May].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我們在五月慶祝勞動節

meanings.meaning_en_US: The greatest in amount, number, or degree.

examples.sentence: She has the [most] beautiful garden.
This is the [most] important issue.
He spent the [most] time on his project.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他在他的項目上花了最多的時間

meanings.meaning_en_US: To a great extent or degree.

examples.sentence: I love you [much].
He doesn't care [much] about that.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他對那件事不是很在意

examples.sentence: There’s not [much] left.

meanings.meaning_en_US: Used to emphasize something surprising or extreme.

examples.sentence: She can [even] speak three languages.
It was [even] harder than I thought.
They [even] apologized.

meanings.meaning_en_US: Used for emphasis.

examples.sentence: She is [very] happy today.
This is [very] important.
He worked [very] hard.

meanings.meaning_en_US: To require something because it is essential or very important.

examples.sentence: I [need] some help with this.
Do you [need] anything from the store?
examples.translation_zh_TW: 你需要從商店買些什麼嗎？

examples.sentence: We [need] to leave early.

meanings.meaning_en_US: Morally good, justified, or acceptable.

examples.sentence: You were [right] about the outcome.
It's not [right] to cheat.
She made the [right] choice.

meanings.meaning_en_US: To a higher degree than is desirable, permissible, or possible; excessively.

examples.sentence: The music was [too] loud for me to concentrate.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 音樂太吵了，我無法專心。

examples.sentence: She is [too] tired to go out tonight.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她今晚太累了，無法外出。

examples.sentence: This book is [too] expensive for my budget.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 這本書對我的預算來說太貴了。

meanings.meaning_en_US: In this place or location.

examples.sentence: Please come [here] to see me.
I left my keys [here] on the table.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我把鑰匙留在桌子上這裡。

examples.sentence: You are welcome [here] anytime.

meanings.meaning_en_US: At or during a time prior to a particular event or time.

examples.sentence: I always wake up [before] the sun rises.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我總是在日出之前醒來。

examples.sentence: Finish your homework [before] you go out.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 在出門之前先完成作業。

examples.sentence: She called me [before] the meeting started.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 會議開始之前她給我打了電話。

meanings.meaning_en_US: A period of 24 hours as a unit of time, reckoned from one midnight to the next.

examples.sentence: Today is a sunny [day].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 今天是一個晴朗的一天。

examples.sentence: We have a busy [day] ahead of us.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我們有繁忙的一天在等著。

examples.sentence: My birthday is on a special [day].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我的生日是在一個特別的日子。

meanings.meaning_en_US: In actual fact, genuinely.

examples.sentence: I am [really] excited about the trip.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我對這次旅行真的很興奮。

examples.sentence: She [really] knows how to cook.
This movie is [really] amazing.

meanings.meaning_en_US: A large number of.

examples.sentence: There are [many] options to choose from.
I have read [many] books this year.
She has [many] friends in the city.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她在這城市有許多朋友。

meanings.meaning_en_US: Indicating a separation or distance from something.

examples.sentence: She turned the lights [off] before leaving.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她在離開之前關掉了燈。

examples.sentence: He jumped [off] the diving board.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他從跳水板上跳了下去。

examples.sentence: Please take your shoes [off].

meanings.meaning_en_US: Up to and including the present or the time mentioned; even now.

examples.sentence: She is [still] waiting for a response.
It is [still] raining outside.
He is [still] the best player on the team.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他仍然是隊裡最好的球員。

meanings.meaning_en_US: To grasp or seize something.

examples.sentence: Can you [take] this box for me?
examples.translation_zh_TW: 你能幫我拿這個盒子嗎？

examples.sentence: Please [take] a seat.
I need to [take] a break.

meanings.meaning_en_US: Used to refer to specific items or people that are not near.

examples.sentence: [Those] books are on the shelf.
Are [those] your friends over there?
examples.translation_zh_TW: 那些是你那邊的朋友嗎？

examples.sentence: I like [those] shoes.

meanings.meaning_en_US: At no time in the past or future; on no occasion.

examples.sentence: I have [never] seen such a beautiful sunset.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我從來沒有見過這麼美的日落。

examples.sentence: He will [never] give up.
She has [never] been to Paris.

meanings.meaning_en_US: The condition that distinguishes animals and plants from inorganic matter, including the capacity for growth.

examples.sentence: He values his [life] above all else.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他把生命看得比任何事情都重要。

examples.sentence: The study of [life] is fascinating.
She wants to live her [life] to the fullest.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她想充分地生活她的生命。

meanings.meaning_en_US: To utter words so as to convey information, an opinion, a feeling or intention, or an instruction.

examples.sentence: I want to [say] something important.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我想說一些重要的事情

examples.sentence: What did you [say] to her?
He didn’t [say] a word during the meeting.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他在會議中一句話也沒說。

meanings.meaning_en_US: Moving in one side and out of the other side of (an opening, channel, or location).

examples.sentence: We walked [through] the park on our way home.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我們回家的路上穿過了公園。

examples.sentence: The bullet went [through] the wall.
She looked [through] the window.

meanings.meaning_en_US: Towards or in a lower place or position.

examples.sentence: She sat [down] on the chair.
Please put your phone [down] on the table.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 請把你的手機放在桌子上。

examples.sentence: The temperature went [down] last night.

meanings.meaning_en_US: Of an extent, amount, or intensity considerably above the normal or average.

examples.sentence: She did a [great] job on the project.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她在這個項目中表現得非常好。

examples.sentence: It was a [great] day for a picnic.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 今天是去野餐的好日子。

examples.sentence: He has [great] ideas for the future.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他對未來有很好的想法。

meanings.meaning_en_US: Used to refer to the final person or thing in a series.

examples.sentence: This is the [last] book in the series.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 這是系列中的最後一本書。

examples.sentence: She was the [last] to arrive.
I cannot remember the [last] time we met.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我不記得我們上次見面是什麼時候。

meanings.meaning_en_US: An adult human male.

examples.sentence: He is a tall [man].
A good [man] is hard to find.
The [man] helped her cross the street.

meanings.meaning_en_US: To employ for some purpose; to put into service.

examples.sentence: You can [use] the library for research.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 你可以使用圖書館進行研究。

examples.sentence: Please [use] this tool carefully.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 請小心地使用這個工具。

examples.sentence: I'm not sure how to [use] this software.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我不確定如何使用這個軟體。

meanings.meaning_en_US: In the space separating two points, objects, or regions.

examples.sentence: The store is located [between] the post office and the bank.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 這家商店位於郵局和銀行之間。

examples.sentence: She had to choose [between] the red dress and the blue one.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她必須在紅色裙子和藍色裙子之間進行選擇。

examples.sentence: There is a fence [between] the two houses.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 兩棟房子之間有一個圍欄。

meanings.meaning_en_US: Measuring a great distance from one end to the other.

examples.sentence: She has [long] hair that reaches her waist.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她的頭髮很長，達到腰部。

examples.sentence: The journey was [long] and exhausting.
He wrote a [long] letter to his friend.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他給朋友寫了一封很長的信。

meanings.meaning_en_US: Identical; not different.

examples.sentence: We wore the [same] costumes for Halloween.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我們穿著相同的萬聖節服裝。

examples.sentence: These two products are the [same] in quality.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 這兩個產品在質量上是相同的。

examples.sentence: They have the [same] idea as we do.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他們的想法和我們的是相同的。

meanings.meaning_en_US: The number that is equal to two plus one.

examples.sentence: I have [three] apples in my bag.
She invited [three] friends to the party.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她邀請了三位朋友來參加派對。

examples.sentence: The book has [three] chapters.

meanings.meaning_en_US: Referring to two things or people together.

examples.sentence: Both of my parents are teachers.
We watched both movies last night.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我們昨晚看了兩部電影。

examples.sentence: This shirt is good for both casual and formal occasions.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 這件襯衫兩者都適合休閒和正式場合。

meanings.meaning_en_US: A piece or segment of something larger.

examples.sentence: She played a major [part] in the play.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她在劇中扮演重要的角色

examples.sentence: Can you bring that [part] of the machine?
examples.translation_zh_TW: 你能帶來那台機器的一部分嗎？

examples.sentence: Every [part] of the puzzle is needed to complete it.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 完成這個拼圖的每一部分都是必須的

meanings.meaning_en_US: An unspecified or unknown object or entity.

examples.sentence: I need [something] to write with.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我需要某個可以寫的東西

examples.sentence: Is there [something] I can do to help?
examples.translation_zh_TW: 有沒有我可以做的事情來幫忙？

examples.sentence: He wanted [something] special for his birthday.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他想要生日的某個特別的東西

meanings.meaning_en_US: Of the highest quality, excellence, or standing.

examples.sentence: She gave her [best] effort in the competition.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她在比賽中付出了最好的努力

examples.sentence: That was the [best] movie I've seen all year.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 那是我今年看過的最好的一部電影

examples.sentence: He always strives to do his [best].

meanings.meaning_en_US: To move or travel toward or into a place thought of as near.

examples.sentence: Can you [come] to the party tonight?
She will [come] over for dinner later.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她晚些時候會過來吃晚餐

examples.sentence: When will you [come] back?

meanings.meaning_en_US: An intense feeling of deep affection.

examples.sentence: She has a deep [love] for music.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她對音樂有著深厚的愛

examples.sentence: He felt a great [love] for his family.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他對家人感到極大的愛

examples.sentence: Love can conquer all barriers.

meanings.meaning_en_US: In or to a position below or beneath.

examples.sentence: The cat is hiding [under] the bed.
We found the keys [under] the couch.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我們在沙發下找到鑰匙

examples.sentence: The book is lying [under] the table.

meanings.meaning_en_US: To direct one's gaze in a specified direction.

examples.sentence: Please [look] at the board.
She turned to [look] at him.
The dog seemed to [look] for something.

meanings.meaning_en_US: The act of directing one's gaze or the appearance of someone or something.

examples.sentence: He had a serious [look] on his face.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他的臉上有一個嚴肅的表情。

examples.sentence: Her [look] was very stylish.
I love the cozy [look] of this room.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我喜歡這個房間舒適的外觀。

meanings.meaning_en_US: From a definite time in the past until now.

examples.sentence: I have lived here [since] 2010.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我自2010年以來就住在這裡。

examples.sentence: She has been happy [since] she got the job.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她自從找到工作就很快樂。

examples.sentence: We haven't seen him [since] last summer.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我們自去年夏天就沒有見過他。

meanings.meaning_en_US: At a time in the past.

examples.sentence: He moved away and hasn't been back [since].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他搬走了，自那時起就沒有回來。

examples.sentence: I haven't eaten chocolate [since].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我自那時起就沒有吃巧克力了。

examples.sentence: They have been busy ever [since].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 自那時起他們一直很忙。

meanings.meaning_en_US: Each one of a group without exception.

examples.sentence: [Every] student must complete the assignment.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 每個學生都必須完成作業。

examples.sentence: [Every] day is a new opportunity.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 每一天都是一個新的機會。

examples.sentence: We visited [every] museum in the city.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我們參觀了這個城市的每個博物館。

meanings.meaning_en_US: Indicating necessity or obligation.

examples.sentence: You [must] finish your homework.
We [must] leave now to catch the train.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我們現在必須離開以趕上火車。

examples.sentence: She [must] see this movie.

meanings.meaning_en_US: At all times; on all occasions.

examples.sentence: She [always] arrives early.
I [always] forget where I parked.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我總是忘記我停在哪裡。

examples.sentence: They are [always] so kind to us.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他們對我們總是那麼友好。

meanings.meaning_en_US: Small in size, amount, or degree.

examples.sentence: She has a [little] cat.
I need a [little] more time.
He is just a [little] boy.

meanings.meaning_en_US: To a small extent.

examples.sentence: I am a [little] confused.
She smiled a [little].
It's a [little] better now.

meanings.meaning_en_US: Having lived for a long time; no longer young.

examples.sentence: She visited her [old] friend from school.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她拜訪了她的老朋友，從學校出來的。

examples.sentence: The building is very [old] but has charm.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 那棟建築非常老舊，但很有魅力。

examples.sentence: He loves collecting [old] coins.

meanings.meaning_en_US: An additional one of the same type.

examples.sentence: Can I have [another] piece of cake?
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我可以再要一塊蛋糕嗎？

examples.sentence: [Another] option could be more effective.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 另一種選擇可能會更有效。

examples.sentence: He needs [another] chance to prove himself.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他需要另一個機會來證明自己。

meanings.meaning_en_US: Throughout the duration of a particular event or period.

examples.sentence: We learned a lot [during] the seminar.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 在研討會期間我們學到了很多。

examples.sentence: Do not talk on the phone [during] the movie.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 在電影期間請不要講電話。

examples.sentence: [During] the winter, it snows a lot here.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 在冬季，這裡下了很多雪。

meanings.meaning_en_US: To discover or locate someone or something.

examples.sentence: I hope to [find] my keys soon.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我希望能快點找到我的鑰匙。

examples.sentence: She will [find] a new job after college.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她將在大學畢業後找到新工作。

examples.sentence: Can you [find] a solution to this problem?
examples.translation_zh_TW: 你能找到這個問題的解決方案嗎？

meanings.meaning_en_US: Of great vertical extent; measuring a long distance from bottom to top.

examples.sentence: The mountain is very [high].
He jumped to reach the [high] shelf.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他跳起來想要拿到高處的架子。

examples.sentence: Her grades are [high] this semester.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她這個學期的成績很高。

meanings.meaning_en_US: The place where one lives permanently, especially as a member of a family or household.

examples.sentence: She always feels safe at [home].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她總是在家裡感到安全。

examples.sentence: [Home] is where the heart is.
He wants to buy a [home] of his own.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他想買一個屬於自己的家。

meanings.meaning_en_US: A particular position or point in space.

examples.sentence: This is the perfect [place] for a picnic.
Have you found a [place] to live yet?
She marked the [place] on the map.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她在地圖上標記了位置。

meanings.meaning_en_US: In a circular direction.

examples.sentence: He walked [around] the park.
The children ran [around] the playground.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 孩子們在遊樂場裡四處跑。

examples.sentence: She turned [around] to see who called her.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她轉過身來看看誰在叫她。

meanings.meaning_en_US: Belonging to oneself or itself.

examples.sentence: She wants to have her [own] business.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她想要擁有自己的生意。

examples.sentence: He takes pride in his [own] achievements.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他對自己的成就感到自豪。

examples.sentence: Each child has their [own] toys.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 每個孩子都有自己的玩具。

meanings.meaning_en_US: Every one of two or more considered individually.

examples.sentence: Each student must submit their assignment.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 每個學生都必須提交作業。

examples.sentence: The coach spoke to each player separately.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 教練單獨跟每個球員交談。

examples.sentence: Each of the cars was painted a different color.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 每輛車都漆成不同的顏色。

meanings.meaning_en_US: To present voluntarily and without expecting compensation.

examples.sentence: She decided to [give] her time to help others.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她決定奉獻時間幫助他人。

examples.sentence: Can you [give] me a hand with this?
He will [give] a speech at the conference.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他將在會議上發表演講。

meanings.meaning_en_US: To assist someone or do something for them.

examples.sentence: I need someone to [help] me with this task.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我需要人來幫我完成這項任務。

examples.sentence: Can you [help] me find my keys?
examples.translation_zh_TW: 你能幫我找我的鑰匙嗎？

examples.sentence: She volunteers to [help] at the local shelter.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她自願在當地收容所幫忙。

meanings.meaning_en_US: Once more; another time.

examples.sentence: Can you say it [again]?
I will try [again].
Please read the book [again].

meanings.meaning_en_US: A form of competitive activity or sport played according to rules.

examples.sentence: We played a fun [game] last night.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我們昨晚玩了一個有趣的遊戲。

examples.sentence: She won the [game] easily.
Board [games] are great for family time.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 棋盤遊戲對家庭時間很有幫助。

meanings.meaning_en_US: An institution for educating children.

examples.sentence: I go to [school] every day.
The [school] has many students.
He enjoys learning at [school].

meanings.meaning_en_US: The final part of something; a boundary or limit.

examples.sentence: We reached the [end] of the road.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我們到達了道路的盡頭。

examples.sentence: This is the [end] of the story.
He waited until the very [end].
